desc: 確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減＆回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A staff of lore from another world. Meant for healers to support their comrades from the sidelines, this staff is said to possess incredible healing and protective powers. The Volunteer Army faced many battles against enemies who sought to destroy its world, and legend has it that it was the Chronicle Staff which saved all of its members from danger by shining its powerful light upon them.

name: 義勇軍の錫杖
